speaker: President.
english: President. Thank you, Mr Gloser. We wish the German Presidency success for the sake of the Europe in which we all share. If Europe succeeds, the Presidency will have succeeded too. That would be an almost perfect outcome.
original: President. Thank you, Mr Gloser. We wish the German Presidency success for the sake of the Europe in which we all share. If Europe succeeds, the Presidency will have succeeded too. That would be an almost perfect outcome.
agenda_item: Roadmap for the European Union's constitutional process (debate)
